Projects

MPPC: Model Predictive Pandemic Control

My work in the project focused on the design and analysis of a deterministic compartmental model for pandemic outbreaks, whose parameters have been estimated by a Moving Horizon Estimation (MHE) framework. The model guarantees parameters identifiability (a feature rarely considered in literature), and it is used to implement a scenario-based model predictive control (SBNMPC). The latter aims to optimally control an evolving pandemic via non-pharmaceutical intervention (NPIs).
